body_html:
@ppwwyyxx , thank you for responding. As far as I know, all my trainable parameters are shape-defined. My only 'partially' defined objects are the placeholders for input images and true labels. But, I'll go through it again as you suggested.

However, at this moment, the same code (with Adam) runs on a machine with TF1.0, while fails on TF1.2. It also worked before I upgraded:

Note that these optimizers had worked for the same code when I was using TF 1.0.1

If you know anything that might have changed concerning optimizers or shape definitions, it would be very helpful to me in confirming or invalidating this behaviour.

body:
@ppwwyyxx , thank you for responding. As far as I know, all my trainable parameters are shape-defined. My only 'partially' defined objects are the placeholders for input images and true labels. But, I'll go through it again as you suggested.

However, at this moment, the same code (with Adam) runs on a machine with TF1.0, while fails on TF1.2. It also worked before I upgraded:
> Note that these optimizers had worked for the same code when I was using TF 1.0.1

If you know anything that might have changed concerning optimizers or shape definitions, it would be very helpful to me in confirming or invalidating this behaviour.
